= Introduction =

The main `trunk` of the project contains the working code. Since this code is computation mechanics research software, the main `trunk` may occasionally have issues or incomplete features. To help avoid such issues, various complete releases are `tagged` and can be check out instead of the main `trunk`.

=Nairn-MPM-FEA Tagged Releases=

==Checking Out a Tagged Version==

To check out a tagged release instead of the current development release, simply change the path in the checkout command. For example, an anonymous check out would be

{{{
svn checkout http://nairn-mpm-fea.googlecode.com/svv/tags/release-1.0
}}}

where the final component is the path is the version you want. See [#Tagged_Versions below] for a list of available tag versions.

==Tagging a Version by Committers==

When then current main `trunk` is table, you can store a tagged version with the command

{{{
svn copy https://nairn-mpm-fea.googlecode.com/svv/trunk \
      https://nairn-mpm-fea.googlecode.com/svv/tags/release-2.2 \
      -m "Tagging stable release 2.0"
}}}

where you enter any unused release number.


==Tagged Versions==

The project `nairn-mpm-fea` was first imported to `GoogleCode.com` in December 2009. The first version was tagged as release 1.0. The following table lists tag, dates, and version numbers of subcomponents for all available tagged versions:
